channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
When i went to compile my 508 server it gave me this:
------------------------- Cmon.. Compile.. Cmon.. ------------------------- Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: */java Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: *.java at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .
If anyone could help me please this is all i need to finish my 508 server plz!!!!

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @tennisbro tennisbro
item.description:
@tennisbro wrote:

i think i almost have it here is my compiler:
@echo off
cd …
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./bin/ ./Bulby/io/*.java
pause

But one problem it gives me this

Unrecognized option: -d
Could not create the Java virtual machine.
Press any key to continue . . .

What more do i need to do like delete the -d???

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 23, 2009, 05:08:19 pm[/size][hr] -verbose[:class|gc|jni]
enable verbose output
-version print product version and exit
-version:
require the specified version to run
-showversion print product version and continue
-jre-restrict-search | -jre-no-restrict-search
include/exclude user private JREs in the version search
-? -help print this help message
-X print help on non-standard options
-ea[:…|:]
-enableassertions[:…|:]
enable assertions
-da[:…|:]
-disableassertions[:…|:]
disable assertions
-esa | -enablesystemassertions
enable system assertions
-dsa | -disablesystemassertions
disable system assertions
-agentlib:[=]
load native agent library , e.g. -agentlib:hprof
see also, -agentlib:jdwp=help and -agentlib:hprof=help
-agentpath:[=]
load native agent library by full pathname
-javaagent:[=]
load Java programming language agent, see java.lang.instrument
-splash:
show splash screen with specified image
Press any key to continue . . .

umm i did something idk if its right tho

Read full topic

item.title: Help please

item.description:
@KoF wrote:

change in the bat file

jdk6.11 to jdk6.12

I changed my compiler so its:@echo off
cd …

pause

then when i ran it it gave me:

‘“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe”’ is not recognized as an internal or external com
mand,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .
